name: Judi McCuaig
content: Judi McCuaig | School of Computer Science Judi McCuaig Retired Professor Research Statement Our research group examines the use of computer systems to improve learner engagement and success in post secondary education.  We use data mining,  intelligent software systems, personalization and user modelling to create effective learning tools that encourage self-regulation  and independence in learning.
